chapters.title: Introduction to Electronic Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter provides an overview of electronic banking, its definition, and its importance in modern financial systems.

chapters.title: Evolution of Electronic Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter covers the historical development of electronic banking, from its early beginnings to its current state.

chapters.title: The Rise of ATMs
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the introduction and impact of Automated Teller Machines (ATMs) on the banking industry.

chapters.title: Online and Mobile Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses the growth of online and mobile banking, including the technologies and innovations that have made them possible.
